attr.title: asteroludi
attr.desc:
Drifting through space, blasting rocks, enjoying the silence — it begins like a calm round of Asteroids.
 But you’re not out here just for fun. You’re mining.
 And soon, you realize... you’re not alone.
attr.inst: Use the left stick or D-Pad to navigate your ship. Use the right stick or face buttons to aim and shoot your weapons. Extract minerals from asteroids by firing your mining laser and fly close to collect them. But be careful not to get too close to large asteroids or enemy ships, as collisions can easily damage or destroy your ship. Sometimes, collisions can be avoided by activating your shields (right shoulder button), but they consume energy quickly.
